You may pay-by-phone using our automated phone number 24/7 @ 1.888.409.2849. Please have your account number and card information. WE DO NOT ACCEPT ACH PAYMENTS.

![city of Hackberry (2)](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/city-of-Hackberry-2.png "city of Hackberry (2)")

Hackberry is a town in Denton County, Texas, United States.
The population was 2,973 in 2020.



###### [Offering paperless billing](https://cityofhackberry.net/notice/we-now-offer-paperless-billing-to-your-email-at-no-charge-please-let-us-know-if-you-are-interested-so-we-may-sign-you-up-and-avoid-postal-issues-of-not-receiving-your-bill/)

[Learn More](https://cityofhackberry.net/notice/we-now-offer-paperless-billing-to-your-email-at-no-charge-please-let-us-know-if-you-are-interested-so-we-may-sign-you-up-and-avoid-postal-issues-of-not-receiving-your-bill/)

[Learn More](https://cityofhackberry.net/attention-water-leak-policies/)

[Learn More](https://cityofhackberry.net/notice/)

###### [UPDATE on Trash Collection for Wednesday, January 28, 2026](https://cityofhackberry.net/notice/cwd-pick-up-week-of-january-28-2026/ "UPDATE on Trash Collection for Wednesday, January 28, 2026")

###### [To make payments 24/7, please call 1-888-409-2849](https://cityofhackberry.net/notice/to-make-payments-24-7-please-call-1-888-409-2849/ "To make payments 24/7, please call 1-888-409-2849")

###### [\*ATTENTION: Water Leak Policies – Need to know](https://cityofhackberry.net/notice/attention-water-leak-policies-need-to-know/ "*ATTENTION: Water Leak Policies – Need to know")

###### [Help Prevent Clogged Sewers](https://cityofhackberry.net/notice/help-prevent-clogged-sewers/ "Help Prevent Clogged Sewers")

[View All](https://cityofhackberry.net/notice/)
![City of Hackberry- Original City Hall](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/bb-plugin/cache/City-of-Hackberry-Original-City-Hall-1-scaled-landscape-165df22cae67d88dcfc11d5d4a83928c-evgjlc8pki06.jpg "City of Hackberry- Original City Hall")

Hackberry is neighbored by Frisco to the east and south, Little Elm to the north, and Lewisville Lake to the south and west. According to the United States Census Bureau, the town has a total area of 0.69 square miles (1.8 km2), all land. It is served by the Little Elm Independent School District.

![Copy of City of Hackberry City hall17](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/bb-plugin/cache/Copy-of-City-of-Hackberry-City-hall17-1-landscape-30fc4a310d2ae706271f45f4cfc15cef-5ovts0z8hckq.jpg "Copy of City of Hackberry City hall17")

Hackberry is a town in Denton County,
Texas, United States. The population was
2,973 in 2020.
